dsaProject

Class Theater

  • java.lang.Object
    • dsaProject.Theater

  • public class Theater
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to store all the information of the theaters themselves. includes the names of the movies, a list of the groups that are within the theater, the seats and rows as well as information of how many seats are open and the total amount of seats that are within the entire theater
    Author:
    Joe Cardona

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Theater(java.lang.String name, int rows, int seats)
      Class constructor that is called in the Menu class Instantiates all the variables that the class has.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addGroup(Group newGroup)
      this method checks to see if there are enough open seats for a new group to enter the theater if not it will throw a TooManyPeopleException with a message that there are not enough seats for their group otherwise it will add the group to the theater while adjusting the number of open seats.
      void fillSeats()
      fills the array theaterGoers with seats based on the amount of rows and seats that were specified by the input when creating the theater class.
      int getOpenSeats()
      this can be used to quickly check if there are enough open seats for a new group to come in and sit down.
      int getRows()
      Gets the rows.
      int getSeats()
      Gets the seats.
      java.lang.String getTheaterName()
      Gets the theater name.
      int getTotalSeats()
      Gets the total seats.
      java.lang.String removeGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
      removeGroup this method uses a binary search to look through the theater for the group that is specified by the name of the group.
      int search(java.lang.String item)
      sequential search used to look through the names of the groups within the theater so to remove them from the theater when they wish to leave.
      void setRows(int rows)
      if the number of rows in the theaters change this will change the number of rows it will also update the total number of seats in the theater.
      void setSeats(int seats)
      if the number of seats in the theater changes this will be used to change the number of seats per row it will also update the total number of seats in the theater.
      void setTheaterName(java.lang.String name)
      changes the name of the movie in the theater.
      java.lang.String toString() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, wait, wait, wait

      • Theater

        public Theater(java.lang.String name,
       int rows,
       int seats)
        Class constructor that is called in the Menu class Instantiates all the variables that the class has. builds up the list of seats as well
        Parameters:
        name - name of the movie in the theater
        rows - how many rows are in the theater
        seats - how many seats per row are in the theater

      • getRows

        public int getRows()
        Gets the rows.
        Returns:
        number of rows in theater

      • getSeats

        public int getSeats()
        Gets the seats.
        Returns:
        number of seats per row in theater

      • getTotalSeats

        public int getTotalSeats()
        Gets the total seats.
        Returns:
        number total number of seats in theater

      • getOpenSeats

        public int getOpenSeats()
        this can be used to quickly check if there are enough open seats for a new group to come in and sit down.
        Returns:
        total number of open seats in theater

      • getTheaterName

        public java.lang.String getTheaterName()
        Gets the theater name.
        Returns:
        String of the name of the movie in the theater

      • setTheaterName

        public void setTheaterName(java.lang.String name)
        changes the name of the movie in the theater.
        Parameters:
        name - new name of the movie

      • setSeats

        public void setSeats(int seats)
        if the number of seats in the theater changes this will be used to change the number of seats per row it will also update the total number of seats in the theater.
        Parameters:
        seats - the new seats

      • setRows

        public void setRows(int rows)
        if the number of rows in the theaters change this will change the number of rows it will also update the total number of seats in the theater.
        Parameters:
        rows - the new rows

      • addGroup

        public void addGroup(Group newGroup)
        this method checks to see if there are enough open seats for a new group to enter the theater if not it will throw a TooManyPeopleException with a message that there are not enough seats for their group otherwise it will add the group to the theater while adjusting the number of open seats.
        Parameters:
        newGroup - group that is entering the theater
        Throws:
        TooManyPeopleException - if there are too many people in the group

      • fillSeats

        public void fillSeats()
        fills the array theaterGoers with seats based on the amount of rows and seats that were specified by the input when creating the theater class.

      • search

        public int search(java.lang.String item)
        sequential search used to look through the names of the groups within the theater so to remove them from the theater when they wish to leave. using sequential search because the plan is to find an open seat as quickly as possible, this can also be used for lists that contain more than one of the same item
        Parameters:
        item - the item
        Returns:
        int value of the location of the item that was searched for

      • removeGroup

        public java.lang.String removeGroup(java.lang.String groupName)
        removeGroup this method uses a binary search to look through the theater for the group that is specified by the name of the group.
        Parameters:
        groupName - the group name
        Returns:
        String of the result of the operation

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        String a list of the seats that are in the theater as well as who is occupying them
